definition: Linfen prefecture-level city in Shanxi 山西
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
name of a river
Linfen prefecture-level city in Shanxi 山西
Linfen prefecture in Shanxi

sentences.english: This paper carried on the preliminary discussion on this question taking linfen as an example.
sentences.chinese: 本文以臨汾市爲例，就此問題進行了初步探討。

sentences.english: Sino-Japanese War early, Linfen in Shanxi Province for seven administrative districts in the 6th District.
sentences.chinese: 抗日戰爭初期，臨汾爲山西省7個行政區中的第6區。

sentences.english: Linfen is one of the most polluted cities on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 臨汾是地球上污染最嚴重的城市之一。

sentences.english: Niuwang is called as Marquis Guangchan not only worshiped in Wei village in Linfen city.
sentences.chinese: 牛王被稱爲“廣禪侯”者，不只臨汾市魏村牛王廟。

sentences.english: At Linfen, residents have said they literally choke on coal dust in the evenings.
sentences.chinese: 臨汾的當地居民說，到了晚上，煤塵讓他們幾乎窒息。

sentences.english: According to the tradition, Ping Yang (present Lin Fen of Shanxi Province) Was Yao's capital.
sentences.chinese: 今山西臨汾，古稱平陽，相傳是帝堯的都城。

sentences.english: Dongkang mineral water is Located at the edge of Linfen faulted basins.
sentences.chinese: 東亢礦泉水處於臨汾斷陷盆地邊緣山前地帶。

sentences.english: Linfen would be windy and its temperature would be twenty-three to thirty-two.
sentences.chinese: 臨汾有風，溫度是二十三到三十二。

sentences.english: Hang out laundry in Linfen and it will turn black before drying, according to Mother Nature Network.
sentences.chinese: 在臨汾晾衣服，還沒幹之前就變黑了。

sentences.english: Ancient County is located in southern Shanxi, Linfen, north-east.
sentences.chinese: 古縣位於山西南部，臨汾東北。
